description.p: In the year 2037, General Atomics International released the first domestic robot for the general masses. These multipurpose robots have been commonly used in homes, hospitals, and even the military.

Ability Score Increase.Your Intelligence score increases by 1, and your Charisma score increases by 1.
Age.A Mr. Handy has a 500 year warranty.
Alignment.Mr. Handys are programmed to follow commands and help for the greater good, but after such a long time in the wild, their programming can change.
Size.A Mr. Handyâ€™s metal body is made of a 3-foot diameter sphere with 3 arms that float 3 feet off the ground. They weigh 120 pounds.
Speed.Your base walking speed is 25 feet.
Languages.You can speak, read, and write in Common and one other language.
Arms!Your 3 arms are versatile tools for completing everyday tasks, but they can also become much more. During a short rest, you can replace one of your hands with any weapon that does not have the Heavy property. This new attached weapon gains +1 to attack rolls.
You Are a Robot.As a robot, you are immune to disease. You do not need to eat or breathe. Instead of sleeping, you enter an inactive state for 4 hours each day. You do not dream in this state; you are fully aware of your surroundings and notice approaching enemies and other events as normal.
Fix Me Up.You do not heal like other races. As an action, you or another character within 5 ft. can make a Technology (Arcana) check. The DC is equal to your level. On a success, you heal 2d4+4 hit points.
